GOD.content: “pardon for not meaning (to say),” secretless secret of literature, scene of forgiveness, its being “up in the air” keeps it secret, announces literature
GOD.linkedContent: “pardon for not meaning (to say),” secretless secret of literature, scene of forgiveness, its being “up in the air” keeps it secret, announces literature

FK.content: [re: names of God] untranslatability of proper name, but also iterability, thus technē [see p. 56 announce impossible translation]
FK.linkedContent: [re: names of God] untranslatability of proper name, but also iterability, thus technē [see p. 56 announce impossible translation]

H.content: Oedipus is twice encrypted, 1st in dying, 2<sup><small>nd</small></sup> in hiding his death > by demanding he be kept dead, he announces a piece of blackmail
H.linkedContent: Oedipus is twice encrypted, 1st in dying, 2nd in hiding his death > by demanding he be kept dead, he announces a piece of blackmail

SPOM.content: to announce oneself, is that not to already be there in a way?
SPOM.linkedContent: to announce oneself, is that not to already be there in a way?

SPOM.content: Marx uses performative, not constative, to announce future of communism
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx uses performative, not constative, to announce future of communism

SPOM.content: self-manifestation of the manifesto, the “here I am” in the announcement of communism (Marx, Engels’ Manifesto)
SPOM.linkedContent: self-manifestation of the manifesto, the “here I am” in the announcement of communism (Marx, Engels’ Manifesto)

SPOM.content: to accuse the other always announces or denounces its imminent return
SPOM.linkedContent: to accuse the other always announces or denounces its imminent return

R.content: plus d’un, divisibility of God, announces democracy
event (im-possible) announces itself in the form of an injunction (comes from on high)
R.linkedContent: event (im-possible) announces itself in the form of an injunction (comes from on high)

R.content: annulment of time announced in date, revolution, volt of the ring (anneau), il faut le temps, default, failure, collapse [autos needing other, event, time, heteronomy]
R.linkedContent: annulment of time announced in date, revolution, volt of the ring (anneau), il faut le temps, default, failure, collapse [autos needing other, event, time, heteronomy]

POO.content: Poe [Purloined Letter] tells the secret twice, w/out same secret being penetrated, matter of trace, secret can be announced w/out being revealed or secret is manifest but still in need of translation
POO.linkedContent: Poe [Purloined Letter] tells the secret twice, w/out same secret being penetrated, matter of trace, secret can be announced w/out being revealed or secret is manifest but still in need of translation

HERP.content: Heidegger calls the fact of not hearing (überhören) the poet that announces future being of a people: a sacrifice ——knowledge of what founds is intolerable, must be, structurally, repressed, excluded, ostracized from what it founds or institutes, must not belong to it (like Rousseau)
HERP.linkedContent: Heidegger calls the fact of not hearing (überhören) the poet that announces future being of a people: a sacrifice ——knowledge of what founds is intolerable, must be, structurally, repressed, excluded, ostracized from what it founds or institutes, must not belong to it (like Rousseau)

HASD.content: call of the other, having always already preceded speech to which it was never present a first time, announces itself in advance as a recall (rappel)
HASD.linkedContent: call of the other, having always already preceded speech to which it was never present a first time, announces itself in advance as a recall (rappel)

EM.content: man’s specificity, as rational animal, announces itself to itself, as an infinite end
EM.linkedContent: man’s specificity, as rational animal, announces itself to itself, as an infinite end

PP.content: living-beings, father and son, are announced to us w/in household (domesticité) of logos
PP.linkedContent: living-beings, father and son, are announced to us w/in household (domesticité) of logos

VM.content: community of question, unbreachable (inentamable) responsibility, impossible has already occurred [beings, history] > there’s a history of the question, pure memory of pure question makes possible all inheritance, announces an injunction, discipline: question must be maintained
VM.linkedContent: community of question, unbreachable (inentamable) responsibility, impossible has already occurred [beings, history] > there’s a history of the question, pure memory of pure question makes possible all inheritance, announces an injunction, discipline: question must be maintained

VM.content: acc. Levinas, concepts anticipate a horizon w/in which alterity is amortized as soon as it is announced—because foreseen, horizon always horizon of the same
VM.linkedContent: acc. Levinas, concepts anticipate a horizon w/in which alterity is amortized as soon as it is announced—because foreseen, horizon always horizon of the same

S.content: promise (Versprechen) announces, salutes, what has already taken place “before” (this is the temporality of the coming of the event, Ereignis or Geschehen), it is the dissymmetry of a yes before opposition of yes and no, before question, language always revient à de la promesse
S.linkedContent: promise (Versprechen) announces, salutes, what has already taken place “before” (this is the temporality of the coming of the event, Ereignis or Geschehen), it is the dissymmetry of a yes before opposition of yes and no, before question, language always revient à de la promesse

S.content: acc. Heidegger, there’s a “must” a “we must think” of the promise, thought as fidelity to promise > must hear & obey
S.linkedContent: acc. Heidegger, there’s a “must” a “we must think” of the promise, thought as fidelity to promise > must hear & obey

PAS.content: death as the impossibility of dying, à partir de laquelle s’annonce la mort sans mort
PAS.linkedContent: death as the impossibility of dying, à partir de laquelle s’annonce la mort sans mort

POOF.content: ‘perhaps,’ announcement of 1st act, 1st scene: only chance granted to the future, chance of chance
POOF.linkedContent: ‘perhaps,’ announcement of 1st act, 1st scene: only chance granted to the future, chance of chance

POOF.content: Derrida assumes responsibility for speaking rightly, justly, up to the point where he is no longer responsible: that is, the point from which all responsibility is announced [the response no longer belongs to me]
POOF.linkedContent: Derrida assumes responsibility for speaking rightly, justly, up to the point where he is no longer responsible: that is, the point from which all responsibility is announced [the response no longer belongs to me]

POS.content: what defers presence (its trace, its sign, its representation) is basis of its announcement or desire
POS.linkedContent: what defers presence (its trace, its sign, its representation) is basis of its announcement or desire

POS.content: differance common root of oppositional concepts, as common root, is also element of the same (distinguished from the identical [Heidegger]) in which oppositions are announced
POS.linkedContent: differance common root of oppositional concepts, as common root, is also element of the same (distinguished from the identical [Heidegger]) in which oppositions are announced

OS.content: metaphysical texts already have resources of their own criticism [re: circle of circles of time] (announces itself in the margin) [doubling of de-limitation]
OS.linkedContent: metaphysical texts already have resources of their own criticism [re: circle of circles of time] (announces itself in the margin) [doubling of de-limitation]

OS.content: l’autre geste, le plus difficile, le plus inouï, le plus questionnant, celui pour lequel nous sommes le moins préparé, can only be sketched (esquisser), announced in calculated fissures of metaphysical text: 2 texts, 2 hands, 2 visions (together simultaneously & separated)
OS.linkedContent: l’autre geste, le plus difficile, le plus inouï, le plus questionnant, celui pour lequel nous sommes le moins préparé, can only be sketched (esquisser), announced in calculated fissures of metaphysical text: 2 texts, 2 hands, 2 visions (together simultaneously & separated)

ROP.content: deconstruction announces status w/out status of nonfinite # of names/quasi-concepts: the thinking of writing called for this, but it’s better thematized and formalized in theory of double bind, stricture of double band, and especially non-ontological remaining
ROP.linkedContent: deconstruction announces status w/out status of nonfinite # of names/quasi-concepts: the thinking of writing called for this, but it’s better thematized and formalized in theory of double bind, stricture of double band, and especially non-ontological remaining

ROP.content: “perpetual threat” (Foucault’s term) as shadow of haunting, threatens logic of historical ages, neither present nor absent, positive nor negative, inside nor outside; “announcing” [in its futural spectrality] poses similar problems for the historian as haunting
ROP.linkedContent: “perpetual threat” (Foucault’s term) as shadow of haunting, threatens logic of historical ages, neither present nor absent, positive nor negative, inside nor outside; “announcing” [in its futural spectrality] poses similar problems for the historian as haunting

ATIA.content: bottomless gaze of other [Levinas], the animal [?], seeing not just seen eyes of other; abyssal limit of the human, ends of man, bordercrossing where man announces himself, ultimate and first event of the end, unveiling, verdict; instant of extreme passion, je suis the apocalypse itself > when all this passes I can speak calmly of beasts of Apocalypse, visit them at the zoo
ATIA.linkedContent: bottomless gaze of other [Levinas], the animal [?], seeing not just seen eyes of other; abyssal limit of the human, ends of man, bordercrossing where man announces himself, ultimate and first event of the end, unveiling, verdict; instant of extreme passion, je suis the apocalypse itself > when all this passes I can speak calmly of beasts of Apocalypse, visit them at the zoo

ATIA.content: every case of naming announces a death to come in the surviving of a ghost, we feel mortal because name seeks to save us, assure survival, it is the feeling (promise) of dying > how could one refuse the animal this experience of death? deprive the animal of nomination?
ATIA.linkedContent: every case of naming announces a death to come in the surviving of a ghost, we feel mortal because name seeks to save us, assure survival, it is the feeling (promise) of dying > how could one refuse the animal this experience of death? deprive the animal of nomination?

DIF.content: the annunciating and reserved trace can be disclosed in metaphysical discourse when stating closure of ontology (Levinas, Freud, Nietzsche, and especially Heidegger)
DIF.linkedContent: the annunciating and reserved trace can be disclosed in metaphysical discourse when stating closure of ontology (Levinas, Freud, Nietzsche, and especially Heidegger)

O.content: preface announces what will already have been written > Derrida claims preface presages a general practice of deconstruction, strange strategy w/out finality, cette défaillance organisatrice of telos or eschaton, which reinscribes restricted economy in general economy——[is this because the preface is an essential and ludicrous operation attempting to cancel out all displacement?]
O.linkedContent: preface announces what will already have been written > Derrida claims preface presages a general practice of deconstruction, strange strategy w/out finality, cette défaillance organisatrice of telos or eschaton, which reinscribes restricted economy in general economy——[is this because the preface is an essential and ludicrous operation attempting to cancel out all displacement?]

O.content: residue of writing remains anterior/exterior to content it announces
O.linkedContent: residue of writing remains anterior/exterior to content it announces

DPi.content: angel came announcing deconstruction of death, but deconstruction has more than one angel, the other warned against banalizing, relativizing DP like Christianity has done, using an alibi of beyond to deny irreversible gravity of death [returns to angels on pp. 253-54]
DPi.linkedContent: angel came announcing deconstruction of death, but deconstruction has more than one angel, the other warned against banalizing, relativizing DP like Christianity has done, using an alibi of beyond to deny irreversible gravity of death [returns to angels on pp. 253-54]

TB.content: for Benjamin, languages intend (as Babelian event) toward being-language of language, this is “pure language,” not transcendent to each language, not Leibnizian universal language
TB.linkedContent: for Benjamin, languages intend (as Babelian event) toward being-language of language, this is “pure language,” not transcendent to each language, not Leibnizian universal language

TB.content: translation, as the accord of tongues, lets the being-language of language resonate, announcing it rather than presenting it
TB.linkedContent: translation, as the accord of tongues, lets the being-language of language resonate, announcing it rather than presenting it

TB.content: translation makes nocturnal intimacy of core emerge [jealousy]
TB.linkedContent: translation makes nocturnal intimacy of core emerge [jealousy]

TB.content: less revelation than promise: “infinite rebirth (Aufleben) of languages”
TB.linkedContent: less revelation than promise: “infinite rebirth (Aufleben) of languages”

TB.content: translation, as holy growth of languages, announces messianic end, but sign of end only “present” in “knowledge of that distance,” Entfernung, remoteness
TB.linkedContent: translation, as holy growth of languages, announces messianic end, but sign of end only “present” in “knowledge of that distance,” Entfernung, remoteness

Gii.content: Heidegger’s Wechselbezug (relation of reciprocity) btwn Erörterung (discussion, awakened literalness of word, situates proper place of Gedicht) and Erläuterung (clarification, elucidation of poems [Dichtungen] themselves) > (announce unique site (Ort) of Gedicht rather than show)
Gii.linkedContent: Heidegger’s Wechselbezug (relation of reciprocity) btwn Erörterung (discussion, awakened literalness of word, situates proper place of Gedicht) and Erläuterung (clarification, elucidation of poems [Dichtungen] themselves) > (announce unique site (Ort) of Gedicht rather than show)

Gii.content: is this Wechselbezug what is called the hermeneutic circle?
Gii.linkedContent: is this Wechselbezug what is called the hermeneutic circle?

PIO.content: Ponge’s “Fable”: poetic performative, describes/carries out, on same line, its own generation; telling & told are undecidable, its constative is its performative (not content w/ announcing, it’s located ironically in evangelical tradition, reveals/perverts structure of envoi)
PIO.linkedContent: Ponge’s “Fable”: poetic performative, describes/carries out, on same line, its own generation; telling & told are undecidable, its constative is its performative (not content w/ announcing, it’s located ironically in evangelical tradition, reveals/perverts structure of envoi)

PIO.content: supplementarity introduces (into structure of psyche) the fabulous repetition, a crossing of chance & necessity, bending performative rules while respecting them: allows other to come, or announce’s its coming, in dehiscence’s opening > deconstruction
PIO.linkedContent: supplementarity introduces (into structure of psyche) the fabulous repetition, a crossing of chance & necessity, bending performative rules while respecting them: allows other to come, or announce’s its coming, in dehiscence’s opening > deconstruction

EL.content: Derrida tempted to collapse abyss & volcano—invisible chasm, catastrophe foments [see D p. 327], one can only interpret (blindly) the fumes that announce what can’t be seen coming
EL.linkedContent: Derrida tempted to collapse abyss & volcano—invisible chasm, catastrophe foments [see D p. 327], one can only interpret (blindly) the fumes that announce what can’t be seen coming

EL.content: Scholem’s nothing (secularization) occurs, not fortuitously analogous to Heidegger’s Was ist Metaphysik: nothingness, nothingness of language, announces “the essence of what it threatens and causes to recoil in totality”
EL.linkedContent: Scholem’s nothing (secularization) occurs, not fortuitously analogous to Heidegger’s Was ist Metaphysik: nothingness, nothingness of language, announces “the essence of what it threatens and causes to recoil in totality”

LI.content: repeatability of same ensures that full presence of a singularity, in being repeated, references something else, thus rending the full presence it announces
LI.linkedContent: repeatability of same ensures that full presence of a singularity, in being repeated, references something else, thus rending the full presence it announces

TN.content: the haptical, for every finite existence, recalls what is coming [Socrates], marks the limit at which or from which the presentation announces itself
TN.linkedContent: the haptical, for every finite existence, recalls what is coming [Socrates], marks the limit at which or from which the presentation announces itself

TN.content: touchable-untouchable, untouchable right on/at (reste à même) the touchable, could only be announced if before any religion, cult, prohibition
TN.linkedContent: touchable-untouchable, untouchable right on/at (reste à même) the touchable, could only be announced if before any religion, cult, prohibition

BSi.content: analogy [re: beast and sovereign] announces (like a black cloud) the historical (actual & virtual) violences, disasters we won’t (already don’t) have a name for
BSi.linkedContent: analogy [re: beast and sovereign] announces (like a black cloud) the historical (actual & virtual) violences, disasters we won’t (already don’t) have a name for

OG.content: death of book announces death of full speech, announces exhaustion of language’s archon [speech], as if language now seen as a species of writing, as a (short) 3000 year adventure: announces new mutation in history of writing
OG.linkedContent: death of book announces death of full speech, announces exhaustion of language’s archon [speech], as if language now seen as a species of writing, as a (short) 3000 year adventure: announces new mutation in history of writing

OG.content: Derrida calls instituted trace “unmotivated” (immotivée), asks that the word “institution” not be so quickly interpreted w/in classical oppositions; “unmotivated” deconstructs Saussure’s arbitrary, thinks its possibility en-deçà de (short of) l’opposition dérivée btwn nature/convention, symbol/sign > becoming-unmotivated of trace requires synthesis where le tout autre s’annonce comme tel: not more natural than cultural
OG.linkedContent: Derrida calls instituted trace “unmotivated” (immotivée), asks that the word “institution” not be so quickly interpreted w/in classical oppositions; “unmotivated” deconstructs Saussure’s arbitrary, thinks its possibility en-deçà de (short of) l’opposition dérivée btwn nature/convention, symbol/sign > becoming-unmotivated of trace requires synthesis where le tout autre s’annonce comme tel: not more natural than cultural

OG.content: the dangerous differance, the master name of this supplementary series: death > metonymic substitution horizon & source, abyss from which each threat announces itself
OG.linkedContent: the dangerous differance, the master name of this supplementary series: death > metonymic substitution horizon & source, abyss from which each threat announces itself

OG.content: image is death, it cannot represent & add representer to represented, thus presence of re-presented folded back on itself in the world, presence announces its dispossession w/in its own representer/death > subject: merely this movement of expropriation
OG.linkedContent: image is death, it cannot represent & add representer to represented, thus presence of re-presented folded back on itself in the world, presence announces its dispossession w/in its own representer/death > subject: merely this movement of expropriation

SPEC.content: demonic in scene of writing/inheritance: en se précédant de son annonce auprès de qui tient lieu prêt pour sa revenue [announcement for those who will hold its place when it comes back] > hope that message will become archival, or indestructible monument of interrupted en-voie
SPEC.linkedContent: demonic in scene of writing/inheritance: en se précédant de son annonce auprès de qui tient lieu prêt pour sa revenue [announcement for those who will hold its place when it comes back] > hope that message will become archival, or indestructible monument of interrupted en-voie
